titleStmt.title: Several discourses ... being some remains of William Allein ... / carefully copy'd from his own notes and publish'd at the request of his hearers.
titleStmt.author: Alleine, William, 1614-1677.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Will. Bonny for J. Allein ...,

notesStmt.note: Wing in error enters this work with the writings of William Allen, Vicar of Bridgewater. For attribution of authorship, see DNB and E. Calamy, The nonconformist's memorial, 1775, v. 1, pp. 443-4.
Reproduction of original in Princeton Theological Seminary Library.
Some print has faded, and there is show-through with loss of print on p. 140. Pages 130-155 photographed from Bodleian Library copy and inserted at the end.

(from t.p.) The unsearchable riches of Christ -- The knowledge of Christ crucified -- The authority and efficacy of the word -- Working out our salvation -- The observation of the Christian-sabbath -- Christ's coming to judge the world.
